summary: The code executes Python's pygments library, formatting the test_code.py file with full lexing and inline line numbers. It generates an HTML output file named "test_code.html" that includes the Python code with syntax highlighting.

details.comment: The code executes Python's pygments library, formatting the test_code.py file with full lexing and inline line numbers. It generates an HTML output file named "test_code.html" that includes the Python code with syntax highlighting.
